original_text: After seven years, Jacob said to Laban, ‘Give me my wife. My time to work for you is finished and I want to marry her.’
korean_text: 야곱이 라반에게 이르되 내 기한이 찼으니 내 아내를 내게 주소서 내가 그에게 들어가겠나이다

sentences.original_text: My time to work for you is finished
sentences.korean_translation: 당신을 위해 일한 제 시간은 끝났습니다

sentences.original_text: and I want to marry her.'
